ygData.subject: Re: Bard petition ideas
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Partied in Najena last night.  Most of my party was bewildered as to why I didn t have my weapons equiped during battle. I smiled and told them I did
ygData.messageBody:
>I have been a firm believer in the power of the Bard's song.
>If you are limiting yourself to only being on the front line
>swinging your sword at the creatures face, you are limiting
>yourself and not helping the party to your full abilities.
>It also takes a lot more bravely to face down a horde of ice
>goblins with nothing more then a lute equiped :)

Partied in Najena last night. Most of my party was bewildered
as to why I didn't have my 'weapons' equiped during battle.
I smiled and told them I did have my weapon equiped and held
up my lute and battle drums.

You feel an aura of elemental protection surrounding you.
You feel a burst of strength throughout your body.
Your wounds begin to heal.

Harmonic Distortion, 25th drummer.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
